radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild atrophy of the left hepatic lobe; Portals veins patent with diminutive left portal vein; Interval resolution of hepatic enhancement at the gallbladder fossa; Geographic areas of arterial enhancement; Focal area of T2 hepatic parenchymal hyperintensity concerning for cholangitis; Gallbladder wall thickening and surrounding inflammatory changes improved; Cholelithiasis; Pneumobilia; Stable pancreatic cystic lesions; No hydronephrosis; Partial gastrectomy noted.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Interval resolution of hepatic enhancement at the gallbladder fossa; Interval improvement of gallbladder wall thickening and surrounding inflammatory changes.
